name: Message
description: Messages is used to display inline messages with various severities.

severity.label: severity
severity.title: Severity level of the message. Valid severities are "success", "info", "warn", "error", "secondary" and "contrast".

closable.label: closable
closable.title: Whether the message can be closed manually using the close icon.

sticky.label: sticky
sticky.title: When enabled, message is not removed automatically.

life.label: life
life.title: Delay in milliseconds to close the message automatically.

icon.label: icon
icon.title: Display a custom icon for the message.

close-icon.label: closeIcon
close-icon.title: Display a custom close icon for the message.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: close
events.title: Callback to invoke when a message is closed.

events.name: life-end
events.title: Callback to invoke when the message's timeout is over.
